What the Mara Fix does is it keeps resetting the trial. When you Turn off the Self Defense and apply the patch it will keep it at 30 days. If you apply the fix and turn the Self Defense back on it will only reset the trial only when you restart or turn off your PC
You didn't say anything about a permanent trial version, but I guess it'll be fine.

ok I finally got this to work!!!  I tried to right click and run the fix as administrator butt that option does not exist...  (vista is a pain in the ass)  so here is what I did...     enable hidden administrator account via command 
(net user administrator /active:yes)
then drop the fix in the public folder and log out!!!  then log in as administrator run the fix and done!!!
when I was done i disabled the administrator account
disable user administrator
(net user administrator /active:no)
hope this helps
